mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS component_id, c.component_type, c.component_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM detection_result dr JOIN component c ON dr.component_id = c.id WHERE dr.task_id = #{taskId} AND dr.direction = #{direction} AND c.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY c.id, c.component_type, c.component_name

SELECT dr.id AS result_id, dr.detection_conf AS detection_conf, dr.is_abnormal AS is_abnormal, dr.x1 AS x1, dr.y1 AS y1, dr.x2 AS x2, dr.y2 AS y2, dr.direction AS direction, rv.id AS vehicle_id, dt.created_at AS task_created_at, dt.updated_at AS task_updated_at, rv.vehicle_info AS vehicle_info, rv.vehicle_desc AS vehicle_desc, rv.record_station AS record_station, rv.vehicle_identity AS vehicle_identity, rv.travel_direction AS travel_direction, rv.bureau AS bureau, rv.section AS section, rv.created_at AS vehicle_created_at FROM detection_result dr JOIN detection_task dt ON dr.task_id = dt.id JOIN railway_vehicle rv ON dt.vehicle_id = rv.id WHERE dr.task_id = #{taskId} AND dr.direction = #{direction} AND dr.component_id = #{componentId} AND dt.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY dr.x1
